message: I propose we split the money 9000-1000 in my favor. It's a fair start, and I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial solution.

Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split which is more reflective of a fair negotiation.  Let's settle this now and avoid further devaluation of the money.
I understand your desire for a more even split, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but 5500/4500 is my final offer.  Let's not waste any more time on this negotiation.
